name: Half-Green Dragon Assassin
languages: Thieves\' cant plus any two languages

traits.Assassinate: During its first turn, the half-dragon has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the half-dragon scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.
traits.Evasion: If the half-dragon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the half-dragon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
traits.Sneak Attack (1/Turn): The half-dragon deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the half-dragon that isn't incapacitated and the half-dragon doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.Multiattack: The half-dragon makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.Light Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.Poison Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The half-dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
